import React from "react"; import {useState} from 'react' import { Layout } from "../components/commons/Layout"; import { Modal } from "../components/commons/Modal"; export const Newsletter = () => { const [show,setShow] = useState(false); const handlerForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; const sendNewsletter = () => { setShow(true); console.log("sendNewsletter"); } return (
Newsletter
); };
